title: Official Inaugration of Office Space
summary: Official inaugration of our new office space near IGI Airport.
description:
The official inauguration ceremony of TMethod Global Private Limited's new office was held on 29th October 2025 at our new premises near IGI Airport, New Delhi. 

We were deeply honored to welcome Mr. Sanjeev Edward, CEO - Cargo & Logistics, as our Chief Guest, who graciously led the ribbon-cutting ceremony to mark this milestone occasion. 
We were also privileged to have our esteemed partners from Bluebox Aviation Systems, Mr. Paul Rayson and Mr. Raj Dhamu, join us for the celebration. 

The event featured both a ribbon-cutting and a traditional lamp-lighting ceremony, symbolizing new beginnings and continued growth. 
Our new office is fully equipped with modern facilities to support our team's operations and further strengthen our collaboration with our global partners.

images.caption: A look at the new office space
Our Team and Guests at the inauguration
